emsat_data.description: This table contains exam results of students from different academic years, schools, and streams, detailing their performance in various subjects along with categorization and proficiency levels.

Academic_Year.description: The academic year during which the exams were taken.

Year.description: The calendar year of the exam results.

StudentID.description: A unique identifier assigned to each student.

School_Code.description: A unique code representing each school.

Student_Name.description: The name of the student in English.

School_Name_AR.description: The name of the school in Arabic.
examples: ثانوية التكنولوجيا التطبيقية - أبو ظبي - بنات
ثانوية التكنولوجيا التطبيقية - العين بنات - العقابية
ثانوية التكنولوجيا التطبيقية - أبو ظبي - بني ياس - بنات
ثانوية التكنولوجيا التطبيقية - أبو ظبي - بنين
ثانوية التكنولوجيا التطبيقية - أبو ظبي - بني ياس - بنين

School_Name_EN.description: The name of the school in English.

GradeLevelID.description: The grade level of the student.

StreamID.description: The stream ID which represents the academic track.

Stream_Code.description: A code representing the academic stream.

Stream.description: The academic stream or program for the exam.

Result.description: The score achieved by the student in the exam.

Result_Category.description: The category of the result based on score range.

Result_Category2.description: A secondary category of the result based on score range.

Result_Category3.description: A tertiary category of the result based on score range.

ResultCategoryOrder.description: The order of the result category.

Result_Category1.description: The primary category of the result based on score range.

ResultCategory1Order.description: The order of the primary result category.

Result_Category_English.description: The English proficiency category of the result.

Result_Category_Arabic.description: The Arabic proficiency category of the result.

Result_Category_Science.description: The science proficiency category of the result.

School_Score.description: The overall score of the school.

Performance_Score.description: The performance score of the student.

EnglishPassed.description: Indicates if the student passed the English exam (1 for pass, 0 for fail).

MathPassed.description: Indicates if the student passed the Math exam (1 for pass, 0 for fail).

PhysicsPassed.description: Indicates if the student passed the Physics exam (1 for pass, 0 for fail).

ChemistryPassed.description: Indicates if the student passed the Chemistry exam (1 for pass, 0 for fail).

BiologyPassed.description: Indicates if the student passed the Biology exam (1 for pass, 0 for fail).

Key.description: A unique key combining the academic year, school code, and stream. This can be used as a foreign key to join with other tables.

Stream_Group.description: The group of the academic stream.

TargetKey.description: A unique key combining the year, stream, and exam subject.

Greater_than_1500.description: Indicates if the Result is greater than 1500 (Yes or No).

Greater_than_1900.description: Indicates if the Result is greater than 1900 (Yes or No).

Greater_than_2000.description: Indicates if the Result is greater than 2000 (Yes or No).

Performance_Score_English_is_Must.description: The performance score when English is a required subject.

Performance_Score_English_and_Math_are_M.description: The performance score when both English and Math are required subjects.

Exams.description: The list of exams taken by the student.

Exams_All_Combinations.description: The list of all possible combinations of exams taken by the student.

target_emsat.description: The table contains 2023 exam target scores for different subjects across various educational streams.

TargetKey.description: A unique key representing the combination of year, stream, and subject.

Target_Score.description: The target score for the exam.

emsat_enrollment_data.description: This table contains the enrollment data of students in different academic streams and schools, including the number of students enrolled in each stream and school.

key.description: A unique key representing the combination of year, school code, and stream.

Enrolled_Students.description: The number of students enrolled in the stream.

psm_snapshot_dim_academic_program.description: Contains information about various academic programs including their codes, names, levels, and specializations.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Program.description: Unique identifier for the academic program.

Academic_Program_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code for the academic program.

Program_Major_Code.description: Code for the major of the academic program.

Program_Major_Name.description: Name of the major of the academic program.

Program_Level_Code.description: Code for the level of the academic program.

Program_Level_Name.description: Name of the level of the academic program.

Program_Credit_Hours_Standard.description: Standard credit hours for the academic program.

Degree_code.description: Code of the degree awarded upon completion of the program.

Degree.description: Degree awarded upon completion of the program.

psm_snapshot_dim_academic_term.description: The table represents academic term data for schools. It includes unique identifiers for each term, business key codes, term names, term numbers, academic years, term years, and the start and end dates of each term. The data encompasses various academic years and terms, providing a detailed breakdown of the academic calendar for different institutions. This structured information helps in managing and analyzing the academic schedules across multiple academic years and terms.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Term.description: Unique identifier for the academic term

key_term.description: Alternate unique identifier for the academic term

Academic_Term_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code representing the academic term

Term.description: Descriptive name of the academic term

TermNo.description: Numerical order of the term within an academic year

Term_Number.description: String representation of the term number

Academic_Year.description: Academic year to which the term belongs

Term_Year.description: Year in which the term occurs

Term_Start_Date.description: Start date of the academic term

Term_End_Date.description: End date of the academic term

psm_snapshot_dim_enrollment_status.description: Contains enrollment status codes and descriptions for students.

Key_SRGT_Enrollment_Status.description: A unique identifier for the enrollment status.

Enrollment_Status_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code representing the enrollment status.

psm_snapshot_dim_student.description: A detailed student dimension containing personal, academic, and contact information, including unique identifiers, nationality status, and demographic details for educational institution management.

Key_SRGT_Student.description: Unique key identifier for each student.

Student_Key_Code.description: Unique code assigned to each student.

Is_National_Student.description: Indicates if the student is a national.

Is_National_Mother_Student.description: Indicates if the student's mother is a national.

Is_GCC_Student.description: Indicates if the student is from a GCC country.

Is_Expat_Student.description: Indicates if the student is an expatriate.

psm_snapshot_linktable.description: Contains link information for student enrollments across various academic organizations, programs, and terms.

EnrollmentKey.description: Unique key for the enrollment record.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Organization.description: Unique identifier for the academic organization.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Program.description: Unique identifier for the academic program.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Term.description: Unique identifier for the academic term.

Key_SRGT_Enrollment_Status.description: Unique identifier for the enrollment status.

Year_Month.description: Year and month of the record.

Month_Year.description: Month and year of the record.

psm_snapshot_student_enrollment.description: Contains information about student enrollments including their academic program, term, and various enrollment statuses.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Organization.description: Unique identifier for the academic organization.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Program.description: Unique identifier for the academic program.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Term.description: Unique identifier for the academic term.

Key_SRGT_Enrollment_Status.description: Unique identifier for the enrollment status.

Number_of_New_to_Program_Students.description: Number of students new to the program.

Number_of_New_to_Level_Students.description: Number of students new to the level.

Number_of_New_to_Institute_Students.description: Number of students new to the institute.

Attempted_Credit_Hours.description: Number of credit hours attempted by students.

Completed_Credit_Hours.description: Number of credit hours completed by students.

Term_GPA.description: GPA of the students for the term.

Has_GPA_Record.description: Indicator if the student has a GPA record.

Program_Credit_Hours.description: Number of credit hours for the program.

Student_Has_Registered_Record.description: Indicator if the student has a registered record.

Student_Has_Active_Registration.description: Indicator if the student has an active registration.

Student_Currently_Enrolled.description: Indicator if the student is currently enrolled.

Number_of_Registered_Terms.description: Number of registered terms for the student.

Student_Contract_Hours.description: Number of contract hours for the student.

EnrollmentKey.description: Unique key for the enrollment record.

psm_snapshot_dim_sponsor.description: Contains details about various sponsors including their key codes and names.

Sponsor_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code for the sponsor.

psm_snapshot_dim_academic_organization.description: Contains information about academic organizations, including campus details and geographical information.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Organization.description: Unique identifier for each academic organization record.

Academic_Organization_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code for the academic organization.

Entity.description: Entity to which the academic organization belongs.

ACDORG_CAMPUS_CODE.description: Campus code used within the academic organization.

campus_city.description: City where the campus is located.

Campus_Emirate.description: Emirate where the campus is located.

Education_Type.description: Type of education provided at the campus.

Campus_Long_Lat.description: Combined longitude and latitude coordinates of the campus.

psm_snapshot_dim_offered_campus.description: Contains enrollment data of students across different campuses.

EnrollmentKey.description: Unique identifier for each enrollment record.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Program.description: Identifier for the academic program enrolled in.

Year_Month.description: Concatenated year and month of the record.

Month_Year.description: Concatenated month and year of the record.

Offered_Campus_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code for the offered campus.

Offered_Authority.description: Authority responsible for the offered campus.

Offered_Entity.description: Entity responsible for the offered campus.

g_and_a_tracking_dim_academic_term.description: Contains information about academic terms including their codes, names, academic years, and dates.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Term.description: Unique identifier for the academic term.

Academic_Term_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code for the academic term.

Term_Number.description: Number of the term within the academic year.

g_and_a_traccking_employment.description: Keeps a track about employment and placement condition of the students. It contains data about academic program, academic organizaiton, counts of graduates, salary etc.

Key_SRGT_Student.description: A unique identifier for each student

Key_SRGT_Academic_Organization.description: A unique identifier for the academic organization

Key_SRGT_Academic_Program.description: A unique identifier for the academic program

Key_SRGT_Academic_Term.description: A unique identifier for the academic term

GraduationCount.description: The count of students who have graduated

ExpectedToGraduateCount.description: The count of students expected to graduate

SecureEmployment.description: Indicates if the student has secured employment

FurtherStudyCount.description: The count of students pursuing further studies

Survey_Flag.description: Indicates if a survey was conducted

Employment_Flag.description: Indicates if employment data is available

Is_Employed.description: Indicates if the student is employed

Proceed_Study_Flag.description: Indicates if the student is proceeding with further studies

GOT_EMPLOYED_PERIOD.description: Period in which the student got employed

RELATIVE_MAJOR_JOB.description: Indicates if the job is related to the student's major

LastYearTermFlag.description: Indicates if it is the last year/term

HighestTermFlag.description: Indicates if it is the highest term

g_and_a_traccking_academic_organization.description: Contains details about various academic organizations, including their locations, authorities, and types.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Organization.description: Unique identifier for the academic organization.

Academic_Organization_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code for the academic organization.

Authority.description: The authority governing the academic organization.

Entity.description: The entity type of the academic organization.

Campus_Code.description: The code representing the specific campus.

Campus_Name_EN.description: The English name of the campus.

Campus_Name_AR.description: The Arabic name of the campus.

Campus_City.description: The city where the campus is located.

Campus_Emirate.description: The emirate where the campus is located.

Education_Type.description: The type of education provided by the campus.

Campus_Longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the campus.

Campus_Latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the campus.

Campus_Long_Lat.description: The longitude and latitude coordinates of the campus.

g_and_a_traccking_student.description: Contains information about students' demographic and identification details.

Key_SRGT_Student.description: Unique identifier for each student record.

Student_Key_Code.description: Code assigned to each student for tracking purposes.

Is_National_Student.description: Indicates if the student is a national.

Is_National_Mother_Student.description: Indicates if the student has a national mother.

Is_GCC_Student.description: Indicates if the student is from a GCC country.

Is_Expat_Student.description: Indicates if the student is an expatriate.

Nationality_Group.description: Group classification of the student's nationality.

Student_Date_of_Birth.description: The date of birth of the student.

Age_Group.description: The age group classification of the student.

Student_Marital_Status.description: The marital status of the student.

Student_Emirates_ID.description: The Emirates ID number of the student.

Student_Passport_Number.description: The passport number of the student.

Student_Email.description: The email address of the student.

Student_Telephone.description: The telephone number of the student.

Student_Mobile.description: The mobile number of the student.

Student_PO_Box.description: The PO Box of the student.

g_and_a_traccking_dim_employer.description: Contains information about employers, including unique identifiers, business key codes, names, and industry sectors.

Key_SRGT_Employer.description: Unique identifier assigned to each employer in the dataset.

Employer_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code associated with each employer for internal reference.

Employer_Name.description: Official name of the employer or organization.
examples: Al Ain General Cont. Co. L.L.C Abu Dhabi
Ruler's Representative Court - Al Dhafrah Region

Employer_Industry.description: Industry sector to which the employer belongs. May contain 'nan' if the information is not available.

g_and_a_traccking_academic_program.description: Contains academic program information including program codes, names, majors, levels, degrees, and specializations.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Program.description: Unique identifier for each academic program entry.

Academic_Program_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code for the academic program.

Program_Major_Code.description: Code identifying the major within the program.

Program_Major_Name.description: Name of the major within the program.

Program_Level_Code.description: Code identifying the level of the program.

Program_Level_Name.description: Name of the level of the program.

Program_Credit_Hours_Standard.description: Standard number of credit hours for the program.

Specialization.description: Specialization within the program, if applicable.

Is_NQA.description: Indicator if the program is accredited or recognized by the National Qualifications Authority.

g_and_a_traccking_employmentfunction.description: Contains information about employment functions and their corresponding codes.

Key_SRGT_Employment_Function.description: Unique identifier for each employment function entry.

Employment_Function_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code associated with the employment function.
examples: Mechanical Engineer - Looking for better opportunities

Employment_Function.description: Descriptive name of the employment function.
examples: Mechanical Engineer - Looking for better opportunities

Employment_Status_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code for employment status.

psa_institutes_admission_data.description: The table contains information about applicants, including their application ID, full names in both English and Arabic, type of application, institute codes, programs applied for, gender, application status, high school streams, campus locations, and institute names. The data encompasses various institutes, programs, and high school backgrounds, providing a comprehensive overview of the applicants' educational choices and statuses.

App_ID.description: A unique identifier for the application.

Full_Name_EN.description: Full name of the applicant in English.

Full_Name_AR.description: Full name of the applicant in Arabic (encoded).

App_Type.description: Type of application submitted by the applicant.

Institute_Code.description: Code representing the institute the applicant applied to.

Program.description: Program or course the applicant applied for.

HS_Stream.description: High school stream or track the applicant followed.
examples: ATHS-General Cluster/التقني العام/  ثانويات التكنولوجيا التطبيقي
ATHS-Advanced Clusters/ني المتقدم/ ثانويات التكنولوجيا  التطبيقية

Campus.description: Campus where the applicant will be studying.

Institute_Name.description: Name of the institute the applicant applied to.

ResponseNo.description: A unique identifier for each survey response.

Answer.description: The rating given by the respondent for a particular question.

Row_No.description: The row number in the dataset.

Date.description: The date when the survey response was recorded.

Year.description: The year the survey response was recorded.

Campus.description: The campus where the survey was conducted.

Grade.description: The grade level of the respondent.

Question.description: The specific aspect of the educational experience or campus environment being rated.
examples: Teachers’ use of different teaching styles to meet the needs of a wide range of students
Teaching and learning relevant to the real world using practical problems and projects

Question_Full_Text.description: The full text of the question being rated.
examples: C1. How would rate the following learning resources/facilities at your campus:  [Laboratories / Workshops]
D1. How would rate the Campus Environment and Services at your campus:  [Students clubs]
C1. How would rate the following learning resources/facilities at your campus:  [Textbooks/ Library resources]
B1. How would you rate the following aspects of your educational experience?  [Teachers’ use of different teaching styles to meet the needs of a wide range of students]
B1. How would you rate the following aspects of your educational experience?  [Teaching and learning relevant to the real world using practical problems and projects]

ResponseCount.description: The count of responses for a particular question.

AnswerScore.description: The score assigned to the answer.

Survey_Result.description: The result of the survey calculated based on the responses.

questionorder_schoolstudentssatisfaction.description: Data consists of questions and their corresponding order for school student satisfaction surveys.

Question.description: The text of the survey question asked to students.
examples: Feedback and encouragement provided from teachers after assessments
School encouragement in community involvement, volunteering and social contribution
Teachers use of time and resources in the classroom

Question_Order.description: The numerical order in which the question appears in the survey.

answerslookup_schoolstudentssatisfaction.description: Table containing the satisfaction levels of school students

Answer.description: The satisfaction rating provided by the students

Answer_Order.description: The order of the satisfaction ratings from best to worst

digital_transformation_revenue.description: Contains revenue details related to digital transformation activities, including invoice and payment statuses.

RevenueKey.description: Unique identifier for the revenue record.

RequestID.description: Identifier for the request associated with the revenue.

InvoiceNumber.description: Unique number for the invoice issued.

PaymentNumber.description: Unique number for the payment made.

InstituteID.description: Identifier for the institute involved in the transaction.

Payment_Date.description: Date when the payment was made.

TaxAmount.description: Tax amount included in the total amount.

digital_transformation_institutions.description: Contains information about institutions involved in digital transformation, including their IDs, names, phone numbers, and email addresses.

examples: Smart Technology For Training Institute - Sole Proprietorship L.L.C.
ATOM TRAINING AND CONSULTANCY INSTITUTE - SOLE PROPRIETORSHIP L.L.C.

digial_transformation_actvet_services.description: This table stores and manages data related to various services offered under a digital transformation initiative. It includes detailed information about each service, its collection methods, channels, transaction statistics, and user satisfaction ratings.

Service_Code.description: A unique identifier for each service.

Service_Name_AR.description: The name of the service in Arabic.

Service_Name_ENG.description: The name of the service in English.

Service_Description_AR.description: A description of the service in Arabic.
examples: تهدف هذه الخدمة الرئيسية إلى تمكين المتعامل من إصدار رخصة تدريب وذلك بعد إستيفائه كافة متطلبات الحصول على الخدمة.

Service_Description_ENG.description: A description of the service in English.
examples: This main service is designed to allow a Customer to Renew Training License after it meets all the requirements.

Beneficiary.description: The target audience or beneficiaries of the service.

Traditional_Collection.description: Indicates whether the service is collected through traditional methods.

Digital_Collection.description: Indicates whether the service is collected through digital methods.

Traditional_Channels.description: Indicates whether the service is available through traditional channels.

Call_Center.description: Indicates whether the service is available through a call center.

EService.description: Indicates whether the service is available as an electronic service (e-service).

Smart_Service.description: Indicates whether the service is available as a smart service.

IsTransformable.description: Indicates whether the service is transformable.

NotYetTransformed.description: Indicates whether the service has not yet been transformed.

Transformed.description: Indicates whether the service has been transformed.

Interactive_Kiosk.description: Indicates whether the service is available through an interactive kiosk.

Auto_Answer.description: Indicates whether the service has an automatic answering feature.

Traditional_Channels_Transactions.description: The number of transactions conducted through traditional channels.

Call_Center_Transactions.description: The number of transactions conducted through the call center.

EServices_Transactions.description: The number of transactions conducted through electronic services.

Smart_Services_Transactions.description: The number of transactions conducted through smart services.

Interactive_Kiosk_Transactions.description: The number of transactions conducted through interactive kiosks.

Auto_Answer_Transactions.description: The number of transactions conducted through automatic answering systems.

Avg_Satisfaction_Traditional_Channels.description: The average satisfaction rating for traditional channels.

Avg_Satisfaction_EServices.description: The average satisfaction rating for electronic services.

Avg_Satisfaction_Smart_Services.description: The average satisfaction rating for smart services.

Avg_Satisfaction_Interactive_Kiosk.description: The average satisfaction rating for interactive kiosks.

Avg_Satisfaction_Auto_Answer.description: The average satisfaction rating for automatic answering systems.

digital_transformationparameters.description: Parameters related to digital transformation initiatives.

examples: Number of visit to be reduced per transaction
Average time for round trip to the entity visit
Average salary for customer per hour (time cost)

linktable_digitaltransformationdashboard.description: Contains information about digital transformation requests, including various date formats, quarter information, and transaction types.

RevenueKey.description: Key identifier for revenue, if applicable.

Month.description: Month of the request as a number.

Year_Month.description: Year and month of the request in YYYY-MM format.

Month_Year.description: Month abbreviation and year of the request.

Quarter.description: Quarter of the year for the request.

QuarterAR.description: Quarter of the year in Arabic.

Quarter_Year.description: Quarter and year of the request.

Year_Quarter.description: Year and quarter of the request.

digital_transformation_satisfaction_surv.description: Contains survey data related to digital transformation satisfaction.

RequestID.description: Unique identifier for each survey request.

Score.description: The satisfaction score provided in the survey.

Survey_Date.description: Date when the survey was conducted.

Response_Count.description: The number of responses received for the survey.

IncludedInSurveyCalc.description: Indicates whether the response is included in the survey calculation.

digital_transformation_requests.description: Contains records of various requests made by institutions, detailing the type of request, its status, and other relevant information.

InstituteID.description: Unique identifier for each institution making the request.

Request_Type.description: Description of the type of request made.

RequestType_Code.description: Unique code representing the type of request.

Request_Date.description: The date on which the request was made.

Resolution_Year.description: The year in which the request was resolved.

Request_Origin.description: The origin of the request, indicating the platform or method used to make the request.

Request_Status.description: The current status of the request.

ServiceCount.description: The count of services associated with the request.

digital_transformation_requesttypelookup.description: Lookup table for digital transformation request types.

RequestTypeCode.description: Unique identifier for the request type.

RequestTypeAR.description: Arabic name of the request type.
examples: إصدار شهادة عدم ممانعة لطرح مؤهلات وطنية

DashBoardName.description: Name of the dashboard associated with the request type.

eee_program.description: This SQL table contains application data for students, including their unique application ID, full names in English and Arabic, application type, institute code, program name, gender, status, high school stream, campus, and institute name. It provides a detailed view of each student's enrollment information and academic background.

No.description: A unique identifier for each record.

Batch_No.description: The batch number associated with the record.

Status.description: The current status of the trainee or employee.

Reason_for_Leaving_the_Program.description: The reason why the trainee left the program.
examples: Lost interest in the program during training period (first two months)
Not confirmed upon completion of training period by employer (first two months)
Left the program due to health / family / personal reasons

Currently_Active.description: Indicates whether the trainee or employee is currently active.

Is_Currently_Active.description: Current activity status of the trainee or employee.

Signed_Contract.description: Indicates whether the trainee or employee has signed a contract.

Signed_Contract_Count.description: The number of contracts signed by the trainee or employee.

End_of_Service_Date.description: The date when the service of the trainee or employee ended.

Training_Date.description: The date when the training started.

Work_Readiness_Training.description: Indicates if the trainee completed work readiness training.

Initial_Salary.description: The initial salary of the trainee or employee.

Current_Salary.description: The current salary of the trainee or employee.

Sector.description: The sector in which the trainee or employee is working.

Employer.description: The employer of the trainee or employee.

Location_or_Branch.description: The location or branch where the trainee or employee is working.

Initial_Job_title.description: The initial job title of the trainee or employee.

Exit_Date.description: The date when the trainee or employee exited the program.

Level_2_Graduation_Date.description: The graduation date for Level 2 qualification.

Level_3_Graduation_Date.description: The graduation date for Level 3 qualification.

Level_4_Graduation_Date.description: The graduation date for Level 4 qualification.

Current_Qualification_Level.description: The current qualification level of the trainee or employee.

Current_Job_Title.description: The current job title of the trainee or employee.

Candidates_Satisfaction.description: The satisfaction level of the candidates.

Employers_Satisfaction.description: The satisfaction level of the employers.

Is_Active.description: Indicates whether the trainee or employee is currently active or withdrawn.

year.description: The year associated with the record.

month.description: The month associated with the record.

YearMonth.description: A combination of year and month in the format YYYYMM.

Month_Year.description: A combination of month and year in the format 'Mon YYYY'.

eee_candidates.description: This SQL table contains information about candidates, including their unique identifier (No), names in English and Arabic, gender, nationality, Emirates ID, phone number, email, city, education level, and joining date. It provides a comprehensive view of each candidate's personal and educational details.

No.description: A unique identifier for each candidate record.

Emirates_ID.description: The Emirates ID of the candidate.

Phone_No.description: The phone number of the candidate.

Email.description: The email address of the candidate.

City.description: The city where the candidate resides.

Education.description: The education level of the candidate.

Joining_Date.description: The date when the candidate joined the program.

customer_survey_CustomerCareSatisfaction.description: Contains information about customer satisfaction surveys related to customer care, including case details, survey dates, scores, and satisfaction levels.

Survey_Date.description: Date when the survey was conducted.

Overall_Score.description: Overall score for the satisfaction survey.

Question.description: The survey question asked to the respondent.
examples: I am satisfied with the response I received regarding my complaint
The procedures for raising a complaint are easy

QuestionID.description: Unique identifier for the survey question.

LinkTable_CustomerCareSatisfaction.description: Data consists of customer care satisfaction survey data with various time-related dimensions and case information.

YearMonth.description: Combined year and month in YYYYMM format.

Year.description: The year for which the customer care satisfaction target is set

Month_Year.description: Month and year in MM YYYY format.

Year_Month.description: Year and month in YYYYMM format.

Year_Month_Name.description: Year, month, and month name in YYYY Month format.

Quarter.description: Quarter of the year (Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4).

Case_Name.description: Name or identifier for the case.

SurveyCount.description: Count of surveys for the given case and time period.

CaseCount.description: Count of cases for the given time period.

Target_CustomerCareSatisfaction.description: Table containing customer care satisfaction targets over different years

Year.description: The year for which the customer care satisfaction target is set

Target.description: The customer care satisfaction target for the given year

Cases_CustomerCareSatisfaction.description: This table stores information related to customer care cases and their satisfaction metrics. It includes details about each case, such as its status, type, origin, and resolution details.

CaseID.description: A unique identifier for each case.

CaseKey.description: A key associated with the case for internal tracking.

Case_Name.description: The name or title of the case.

Case_Status.description: The current status of the case.

Claim_Type.description: The type of claim associated with the case.

ClaimTypeID.description: A unique identifier for the claim type.

Comments.description: Additional comments or notes about the case.

Origin.description: The origin of the case, indicating how it was reported.

Category.description: The category to which the case belongs.

examples: Subject: Consulate General of Italy - InquiryDescription:**CAUTION FROM ACTVET MAILING SYSTEM**  External email. Please DO NOT click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.        Greetings from the Consulate General of Italy in Dubai,   The Consulate General of Italy in Dubai would kindly request if your esteemed Centre has a branch in Dubai or if there is one similar that offer Technical and Vocational Education and Training in Dubai   Many thanks in advance for your kind support.Kind regards,Marwa El Ettr Head of Commercial & Cultural Affairs    Consolato Generale d’Italia /  Consulate General of Italy  Dubai World Trade Centre, 17th floor, Sheikh Zayed Road, P.O. Box: 9250 – Dubai – U.A.E.www.consdubai.esteri.it T +971 4 3314167 ext. 203

Creation_Date.description: The date when the case was created.

Resolution_Date.description: The date when the case was resolved.

Resolution_Duration1.description: The primary measure of the time taken to resolve the case.

Resolution_Duration2.description: The secondary measure of the time taken to resolve the case.

Temp_Date.description: A temporary date field for various uses.

IsLicensing.description: Indicates whether the case is related to licensing.

Category_Group.description: The group category to which the case belongs.

psa_institutes_admission_data.description: Contains information about applicants to various academic programs including their application details, program choices, and statuses across different campuses.

Full_Name_EN.description: Full English name of the applicant.

Full_Name_AR.description: Full Arabic name of the applicant.

Institute_Code.description: Code of the institute to which the application is made.

Program.description: Program the applicant is applying to.

HS_Stream.description: High school stream of the applicant.

Campus.description: Campus name where the applicant plans to attend.

alumni_records.description: Contains information about student admissions, including business key codes, application numbers, entities, campuses, approved institutes, majors, and other academic details.

Student_Business_Key_Code.description: Unique business key code for the student.

NAPO_Application_No.description: Application number assigned by the National Admissions and Placement Office (NAPO).

Academic_Organization_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code for the academic organization.

Approved_Institute.description: Name of the approved institute for admission.

CP.description: Cumulative Percentage score of the student.

EMSAT_English_Score.description: EMSAT English score of the student.

DIM_STUDENT_SCHOOL_ALUMNI.description: Contains information about school alumni including their names, nationalities, and personal details.

Student_Business_Key_Code.description: Unique business key code for the student.

examples: Maitha Saif Sultan Mohammed Al Shamis

Is_National_Student.description: Indicator if the student is a national.

Is_National_Mother_Student.description: Indicator if the student has a national mother.

Is_GCC_Student.description: Indicator if the student is from GCC.

Is_Expat_Student.description: Indicator if the student is an expatriate.

Student_Date_of_Birth.description: Date of birth of the student.

DIM_ACADEMIC_ORGANIZATION_SCHOOL_ALUMNI.description: Contains information about academic organizations and their respective schools, including details about the campus location, capacity, and education type.

Academic_Organization_Business_Key_Code.description: Business key code for the academic organization.

Campus_City.description: City where the campus is located.

Campus_Emirate.description: Emirate where the campus is located.

Education_Type.description: Type of education provided at the campus.

Campus_Long_Lat.description: Longitude and latitude of the campus location as an array.

asia.description: Data representing skills competition participants and details in Asia, including names, skills categories, years, countries, schools, and related information.

AsiaKey.description: Primary key for the record in Asia skills competition data
examples: Mariam Najeeb Amiri|3D Digital Game Art

Year_Asia.description: Year of the Asia skills competition

Asia_Skills_Country.description: Country where the Asia skills competition took place

Asia_Country_Category.description: Category of skills competition within the country

Asia_Skills_Medal.description: Medal won in the Asia skills competition

School_Asia_Skills.description: School or institution related to the participant's skills competition

School_System_AsiaSkills.description: System or accreditation related to the school/institution

Asia_Skills_Winner.description: Indicator of whether the participant won (1) or not (0)

Asia_Skills.description: Indicator or score related to skills demonstrated

gcc.description: Data representing skills competition participants and details in GCC countries, including names, skills categories, years, countries, schools, and related information.

GCCKey.description: Primary key for the record in GCC skills competition data
examples: Nouf Salem Alkaabi|IT Software Solutions for Business

Year_GCC.description: Year of the GCC skills competition

GCC_Country.description: Country where the GCC skills competition took place

GCC_Country_Category.description: Category of skills competition within the GCC country

School_GCCSkills.description: School or institution related to the participant's skills competition

School_System_GCC_Skills.description: System or accreditation related to the school/institution

GCC_Winner.description: Indicator of whether the participant won (1) or not (0)

GCC_Medal.description: Medal won in the GCC skills competition

GCC_Skills.description: Indicator or score related to skills demonstrated

competitors.description: Data representing competitors in skills competitions, including details such as names, genders, birth dates, contact information, training details, and employment status.

Key.description: Primary key for the record in competitors data

GCCKey.description: Foreign key referencing GCC skills competition data

AsiaKey.description: Foreign key referencing Asia skills competition data

SR_No.description: Serial number or identifier for the competitor

Birth_of_Date.description: Date of birth of the competitor

Emirate.description: Emirate or region associated with the competitor

School_System.description: Educational system or accreditation of the competitor's school

School.description: School or institution where the competitor studied

Category.description: Category or field of competition the competitor participated in

National_Competition.description: Indicator of participation in national level competitions

Local_Training_Count.description: Count of local training sessions attended

International_Training_Count.description: Count of international training sessions attended

Expert_In.description: Field of expertise for the expert involvement

Chief_Expert_In.description: Field of expertise for the chief expert involvement

Another_World_Skills.description: Indicator of participation in another world skills event

Contacted_Count.description: Count of times the competitor has been contacted

winners.description: Data representing winners in skills competitions, including details such as scores, participation status, medals won, and winner status.

Key.description: Primary key for the record in winners data

IsWorldSkills.description: Indicator of participation in WorldSkills competition

ss_behaviour_dim_student.description: Contains information about students' demographic and personal details.

Nationality_Group.description: Group classification of the student's nationality.

Student_Date_of_Birth.description: Date of birth of the student.

ss_behaviour_fact_enrollment.description: to track students' enrollment and behavior patterns across different academic streams and organizations.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Stream.description: A unique identifier for the academic stream or program the student is enrolled in.

Year.description: The calendar year of the record.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Organization.description: A unique identifier for the academic organization

Academic_Year.description: The academic year the record pertains to.

BehaviourKey.description: A unique identifier for a specific behavior or event related to the student.

Number_of_Students.description: The number of students associated with the specific behavior or event.

Student_ID.description: A unique identifier for each student.

ss_behaviour_dim_academic_organization.description: Contains information about academic organizations, their locations, and associated codes.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Organization.description: Unique identifier for each academic organization entry.

School_Code.description: Code representing the specific school or campus.

Campus.description: Name of the campus or specific location of the school.

Campus_City.description: City where the campus is located.

Campus_Emirate.description: Emirate where the campus is located.

ss_behaviour_streamsrgt_mapping.description: A mapping data that consists of academic stream business key codes to their corresponding srgt keys for efficient data management and querying.

Academic_Stream_Business_Key_Code.description: Unique code representing the academic stream and business key.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Stream.description: SRGT key for the academic stream.

ss_behaviour_studentsbehaviour.description: Contains detailed information about student behavior incidents, including personal information, violation details, and administrative actions.

BehaviourKey.description: Unique identifier for each behavior incident.

Case_Reference.description: Reference code for each behavior case.

Cluster.description: Cluster code for the student's group.

Campus.description: Campus code where the incident occurred.

Term.description: Academic term when the incident occurred.used to group student by term

Status.description: Current status of the behavior case.

Points.description: Points assigned to the behavior incident.

Concern.description: Specific concern related to the incident.

Violation_Date.description: Date and time of the violation.

examples: Bringing of mobile phone or abuse any of the means of communication.

Violation_ID.description: Identifier for the type of violation.

examples: Anything similar to these irregularities is at the discretion of the Conduct Management Subcommittee. (5 Points)
Smoking or possession of smoking materials on ATHS premises means of transport or whilst wearing the school uniform

Accrued_Points.description: Total points accrued by the student.

Accrued_Points_Range.description: Range of accrued points for categorization.

Accrued_Points_Range_Sort_Order.description: Sorting order for the accrued points range.

Case_Ref.description: Reference code for the case, similar to Case_Reference.

examples: ALI AHMED ALI BAL HAYEMA ALDHAHERI
Shamma Mohammed Slayem Al Douda Alameri
Bringing of mobile phone or abuse any of the means of communication.
Anything similar to these irregularities is at the discretion of the Conduct Management Subcommittee. (5 Points)
Smoking or possession of smoking materials on ATHS premises means of transport or whilst wearing the school uniform
كل ما هو شبيه بهذه المخالفات وفق تقدير لجنة إدارة السلوك الفرعية (5 نقاط)
التدخين أو حيازة مواد التدخين في الثانوية أو في وسائل النقل أو في أثناء ارتداء الزي المدرسي

SS_Behaviour_Dim_Academic_Stream.description: This table stores dimensional data related to academic streams, potentially for behavioral analysis. It links streams with academic organizations (Key_SRGT_Academic_Stream), student grades, clusters (areas of focus), and potentially homeroom assignments.

Key_SRGT_Academic_Stream.description: Unique identifier for an academic stream within the SRGT system.

Stream.description: Name or type of the academic stream a student might be enrolled in. May include null values.

Homeroom.description: Possibly a code or identifier for a student's homeroom assignment. The format and meaning might require further investigation.

Grade.description: Student's grade level associated with the stream. May include non-numeric values and nulls.

Cluster.description: Area of focus or specialization within the academic stream. May include null values.
